author: Special Correspondent
text:
The district administration will receive petitions from the farmers who suffered loss due to floods last year, said K. Nandakumar, Collector.

Presiding over farmers grievances day meeting held here on Saturday, he referred to complaints from a section of farmers who alleged that a number of farmers has been omitted and were yet to receive relief for the heavy loss sustained during the floods and said that the administration would receive fresh petitions from genuine farmers who incurred heavy loss. He said that the district realised 1,109.14 mm of rain during last year against the average realisation of 861 mm.

Inputs and implements on fish farms should be stocked there.
title: Submit petition for flood relief: Collector
